description: Workflow for Purrfect Pets API entity handling fetching, caching, favoriting pets and logging events
name: purrfect_pets_workflow

transitions.description: Fetch pets from external API and cache them
transitions.end_state_description: Pets data has been fetched and cached
transitions.name: start_fetch_and_cache_pets

externalized_processors.description: Fetch and cache pets from external Petstore API
externalized_processors.name: process_fetch_and_cache_pets

transitions.description: Mark a pet as favorite if petId is provided
transitions.end_state_description: Pet has been marked as favorite
transitions.name: mark_favorite_pet

externalized_processors.description: Mark pet as favorite in entity data
externalized_processors.name: process_favorite_pet

transitions.start_state_description: Pets data has been fetched and cached

transitions.name: log_event
transitions.start_state_description: Pet has been marked as favorite
